verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Again, thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \add he be\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, or of the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \add any\add* of his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* unto \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*; he shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.

And I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against that \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and will cut him \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; because he hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* of his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* unto \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*, to \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, and to \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

And if the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* do any \w ways|strong="H5956"\w* \w hide|strong="H5956"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* from the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, when he \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* of his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* unto \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*, and \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* him \w not|strong="H1115"\w*:

Then I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against that \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and against his \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, and will cut him \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, and all that go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, to commit \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w* with \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*, from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* their \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ And the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w turneth|strong="H6437"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w* such as have familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w wizards|strong="H3049"\w*, to go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, I will even \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against that \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and will cut him \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
¶ \w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* yourselves therefore, and be ye \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*: for I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* you.

¶ For \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* that \w curseth|strong="H7043"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* or his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* shall be \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: he hath \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* or his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*; his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shall be\add* upon him.

¶ And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that committeth \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* with \add another\add* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \add even he\add* that committeth \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* with his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, the \w adulterer|strong="H5003"\w* and the \w adulteress|strong="H5003"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w lieth|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* hath \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*: \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*; their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shall be\add* upon them.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with his daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*, \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: they have \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w confusion|strong="H8397"\w*; their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shall be\add* upon them.

If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* also \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with \w mankind|strong="H2145"\w*, as he \w lieth|strong="H4904"\w* with a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*: they shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*; their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shall be\add* upon them.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* and her \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, it \add is\add* \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w*: they shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, both he and they; that there be no \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lie|strong="H5414"\w* with a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: and ye shall \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*.

And if a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* unto any \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, and lie \w down|strong="H7250"\w* thereto, thou shalt \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, and the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: they shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*; their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shall be\add* upon them.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* his \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*, and she \w see|strong="H7200"\w* his \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*; it \add is\add* a wicked \w thing|strong="H2617"\w*; and they shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of their \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: he hath \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* his \w sister’s|strong="H0269"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*; he shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* having her \w sickness|strong="H1739"\w*, and shall \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* her \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*; he hath \w discovered|strong="H6168"\w* her \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w*, and she hath \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* the \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* of her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: and \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* their \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 20.18 \ft discovered: Heb. made naked\f*

And thou shalt not \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* the \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* of thy \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, nor of thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: for he \w uncovereth|strong="H6168"\w* his near \w kin|strong="H7607"\w*: they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.\f + \fr 20.19 \ft uncovereth: Heb. hath made naked\f*

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w uncle’s wife|strong="H1733"\w*, he hath \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* his \w uncle’s|strong="H1730"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*: they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*; they shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w childless|strong="H6185"\w*.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* his \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, it \add is\add* an unclean \w thing|strong="H5079"\w*: he hath \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* his \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*; they shall be \w childless|strong="H6185"\w*.\f + \fr 20.21 \ft an…: Heb. a separation\f*

¶ Ye shall therefore \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and all my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them: that the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whither I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein, spue you not \w out|strong="H6958"\w*.

And ye shall not \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w manners|strong="H2708"\w* of the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, which I cast \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you: for they \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* all these things, and therefore I \w abhorred|strong="H6973"\w* them.

But I have \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto you, Ye shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* their \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it unto you to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which have \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* you from \add other\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Ye shall therefore put \w difference|strong="H0914"\w* between \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* and \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, and between \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* and \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*: and ye shall not make your \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8262"\w* by \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, or by \w fowl|strong="H5775"\w*, or by any manner of living thing that \w creepeth|strong="H7430"\w* on the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, which I have \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* from you as \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.\f + \fr 20.25 \ft creepeth: or, moveth\f*

And ye shall be \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* unto me: for I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add am\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, and have \w severed|strong="H0914"\w* you from \add other\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that ye should be mine.

¶ A \w man|strong="H0376"\w* also or \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that \w hath|strong="H3588"\w* a familiar \w spirit|strong="H0178"\w*, or that is a \w wizard|strong="H3049"\w*, shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: they shall \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* them with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shall be\add* upon them.
